Title: Julieta
Writer: Pedro Almodóvar, Alice Munro (basado en "Destino",  "Pronto" y "Silencio" de)
Actors: Emma Suárez, Adriana Ugarte, Daniel Grao, Inma Cuesta
Plot: After a casual encounter, a brokenhearted woman decides to confront her life and the most important events about her stranded daughter.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 14 wins & 61 nominations.
